```pddl
[
  '(:action poke
    :parameters (?agent - agent ?entity - object ?tool1 - tool ?tool2 - tool)
    :precondition (and 
                   (available ?agent)
                   (not (poked ?entity))
                   (or (and (coconut_drain ?entity)
                            (tool1_location ?tool1 in_hand)
                            (tool2_location ?tool2 in_hand))
                       (and (at ?entity kitchen)
                            (at ?agent kitchen)
                            (at ?tool1 kitchen))))
    :effect (and 
             (poked ?entity)
             (hole_in_coconut ?entity)))',

  '(:action drain
    :parameters (?actor - agent ?source - object ?target - container)
    :precondition (and
                    (at ?actor kitchen)
                    (or
                      (and (coconut_location ?source upside_down) (glass_empty ?target))
                      (and (broken ?source) (at ?target kitchen))
                      (eye_poked ?source)
                    )
                    (not (checked ?actor ?source))
                   )
    :effect (and
              (glass_full ?target)
              (drained ?source)
              (screwdriver_removed ?source)))',

  '(:action wrap
    :parameters (?agent - agent ?tool - tool ?item - object ?state - state)
    :precondition (and 
                    (in_hand ?tool)
                    (valid_state ?item ?state)
                    (not (wrapped ?item ?tool))
                   )
    :effect (and 
              (wrapped ?item ?tool)
              (updated_state ?item new_state)
              (not (valid_state ?item ?state))))',

  '(:action break
    :parameters (?agent - agent ?item - object ?tool - tool ?surface - object ?state - state)
    :precondition (and 
                    (available ?agent)
                    (at ?agent ?state)
                    (at ?item ?state)
                    (or
                        (and (wrapped ?item ?tool) (cooled ?item))
                        (and (intact ?item) (hard_surface ?surface))
                        (and (poked ?item) (at ?tool ?state))
                    ))
    :effect (and 
              (broken ?item)
              (not (intact ?item))))',

  '(:action acquire-screwdriver
    :parameters (?p - agent ?s - screwdriver)
    :precondition (and
                    (not (in_hand ?s))
                    (in_toolbox ?s)
                   )
    :effect (and
              (in_hand ?s)
              (not (in_toolbox ?s))))',

  '(:action position-screwdriver-on-coconut
    :parameters (?p - agent ?s - screwdriver ?c - coconut)
    :precondition (and
                    (in_hand ?s)
                    (not (positioned ?s ?c))
                   )
    :effect (and
              (positioned ?s ?c)
              (not (in_hand ?s))))',

  '(:action acquire
    :parameters (?p - agent ?item - object ?location - location)
    :precondition (and
                    (not (in_hand ?item))
                    (at ?item ?location)
                   )
    :effect (and
              (in_hand ?item)
              (not (at ?item ?location))))'
]
```
